item.title: How to pair wine with your favorite Easter candy
item.description:
How to pair wine with your favorite Easter candy

Because building a Peeps diorama  can be a lot more fun with wine than without it, we thought we'd help by providing a guide to pairing wine with Easter candy. The guide was curated by former winemaker Ryan O'Connell, who now works for  NakedWines.com , an online wine retailer that funds independent winemakers around the world.

item.title: How Climate Change Is Improving Wine
item.description:
How Climate Change Is Improving Wine

If you find yourself a little down while dwelling on the fact that humankind is fueling a global environmental catastrophe with its carbon emissions, cheer up. At least in the short term, you'll have higher-quality wines to drink away your woes.

item.title: Wineries, spas and shops make Napa Valley's Calistoga a delight to visit
item.description:
Wineries, spas and shops make Napa Valley's Calistoga a delight to visit

CALISTOGA, CALIF. * The casual vibe in Calistoga, in a setting perfectly suited to relaxation, annually draws more than a million people to this town of 5,000-plus perched on the northwestern edge of the famous Napa Valley. They come year-round for the warm mineral pools, the welcoming resorts and, of course, the world-famous wine.

item.title: Let's Talk Wine: The fabulous Napa cabs
item.description:
Let's Talk Wine: The fabulous Napa cabs
